Articles.Content:
Hi everybody,

I was working with the Kethane mod and an idea struck me. When mining for Kethane, one needs a kethane deposit and a massiv amount of solar energy and batteries, or the mining facility rests at night.

Now, as we are used to burn every thing we can digg up as humans, I thought I would like to build a kethane reactor.

I looked up and down the forums, but couldn't find anything of that sorts.

Now I wanted to get a foot in Mod-development and so on and I want to realize my dream of an kerbal-eco-unfreandly power-source!

All I need is encouregment, a little help and (of course!!) a texture modeler, as I am really crappy with that stuff!

Would somebody like to join me?

Cheers.

edit: Could a mod change the title to "Kethane"?

Angeldust

Edited May 6, 2013 by angeldust
